item.description:
Dean  will bring a pole with green cloth on it so everyone will know where the crowd is. If you still can't find us, call Dean on his cell 860-508-9371 Dean and Ann are organizers

Pilobolus Saturday, September 22nd, 7:30pm

 Members of this world-renowned dance company will captivate you with their amazing body contortions, movements and sense of humor. 

Mortensen Riverfront Plaza

bring a blanket or chair, food and drink to share, and a sweater, great event, cancels if rain

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: Pilobolus at Mortensen Riverfront -- Dean & Ann are organizers
